body_html:
@sdgandhi @eleijonmarck and anyone else interested in chatting.

Have you considered Matrix (http://matrix.org) or the #machinelearning channel on freenode IRC (or making a dedicated tensorflow IRC channel?). It would be more accessible to the public than Slack since both Matrix and IRC are open standards for chatting.

Using Matrix clients such as http://vector.im provide most all of the user experience goodness of Slack in my experience.

BTW, if you are on the matrix.org Matrix server you can join the #freenode_#machinelearning:matrix.org channel for an IRC bridge between Matrix and Freenode.
